title: Mediterranean spiral loaf
ingredients: ['250 g (8½ oz) strong white (bread) flour', '200 g (7 oz) strong wholemeal (bread) flour', '1 tsp salt', '1 sachet easy-blend dried yeast, about 7 g', '¼ tsp caster sugar', '1 tbsp fennel seeds', '300 ml (10 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '30 g (1 oz) butter', '2 red or yellow peppers, halved and seeded', '3 tbsp sun-dried tomato paste', '½ small red onion, thinly sliced', '3 tbsp freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tsp extra virgin olive oil']
